allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Phase 6: React Native mobile app with full feature set

Implement comprehensive mobile application for Intensely HICT workout platform with
authentication, workout flows, exercise library, progress tracking, and profile management.

Features added:
- Authentication system with Supabase integration and auto token refresh
- Three workout generation flows \(Jump Right In, Let Us Curate, Take the Wheel\)
- Live workout execution screen with interval timer and progress tracking
- Exercise library with search, filtering, and favorites functionality
- Progress tracking with personal records and exercise history logging
- Profile management with preferences and settings
- Type-safe navigation with nested stack navigators
- Zustand state management for auth, workouts, and sessions
- API client with automatic token injection and 401 refresh handling

Screens implemented \(40+ screens\):
- Auth: Welcome, Login, SignUp
- Home: HomeMain, WorkoutFlowSelection, JumpRightIn, LetUsCurate, TakeTheWheel,
  ExerciseSelection, WorkoutPreview, WorkoutExecution, WorkoutComplete
- Exercises: ExercisesList, ExerciseDetail, Favorites
- Progress: ProgressOverview, ExerciseProgress, LogProgress
- Profile: ProfileMain, EditProfile, Preferences, Settings

Technical stack:
- React Native with Expo SDK 54
- TypeScript for type safety
- React Navigation \(bottom tabs + nested stacks\)
- Zustand for state management
- Axios for API calls
- Supabase for authentication
- AsyncStorage for persistence

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
